short_description: apesigned is a clothing store based in geneva, switzerland.
long_description: slow fashion with beautiful clothes & accessories, handmade with love to reflect your true self. from vietnam... to switzerland ... aoesigned is a conscious fashion label promoting "handmade with love" collections and local craftsmanship know-how. either in collaboration with an established network of vietnamese artisans or directly made in switzerland to create slow fashion with style. by creating tailor-made products and limited editions with high quality upcycled fabrics like silk, and cotton coming from end of fabric rolls of the fast fashion industry and upcycled fabrics from the ethnic minorities. apesigned is truly engaged in the energy efficiency and waste management in the whole creating process until the packaging, made of recycled paper and carton boxes. our clothes and accessories are handmade with love by our artisans working in small family businesses and guaranteed full traceability as apesigned knows personally all artisans we are working with from the supply of raw materials, the confection until the finished product.

generated_description: apesigned is a swiss fashion label based in geneva, specializing in fair trade and tailor-made fashion for men, women, and children. the company collaborates with artisans in vietnam to create handmade collections, offering a range of sizes including tall, small, and plus sizes. apesigned emphasizes sustainability and ethical production, using upcycled fabrics and promoting local craftsmanship. the label is committed to energy efficiency and waste management, ensuring full traceability of its products from raw materials to finished goods.

locations: ch, switzerland, geneva, geneva, 1202, rue jean-robert-chouet, 4, 46.211501549999994, 6.1350049552515635
short_description: apesigned is a clothing store based in geneva, switzerland.
long_description: slow fashion - advanced performance for equityapesigned is a swiss-vietnamese fair fashion label promoting hand & tailor-made fashion for men, women and kids. our network combines the craftsmanship of the divers ethnic minorities to the local know-how of the artisans while providing customers with timeless, hand-selected items of impeccable quality and style. the label is a heart project which hopes to shine a light on the handmade products found in the vietnamese culture and to empower small family businesses. apesigned contributes as well to the fashion revolution "who made my clothes" by using as much as possible up-cycled fabrics in their collections to bring advanced performance for equity in fashion.
business_tags: fashion and clothing | retail apparel and fashion brand | tailor-made clothing | fashion revolution
generated_description: apesigned is a swiss-vietnamese fair fashion label that promotes hand and tailor-made fashion for men, women, and children. they combine the craftsmanship of various ethnic minorities with the local know-how of artisans to provide customers with timeless, hand-selected items of impeccable quality and style. the label aims to showcase handmade products from vietnamese culture and empower small family businesses. apesigned also contributes to the fashion revolution by using up-cycled fabrics in their collections, promoting advanced performance for equity in fashion.
